name: Nacht der Untoten
description: The 1st zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: World at War*, remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops*, and remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops III*. The map takes place in a small building in an abandoned airfield.

name: Verr√ºckt
description: The 2nd zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: World at War*, remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops*, and remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops III*. The map takes place at Group 935's Asylum Facility in the Wittenau Sanatorium in Berlin.

name: Shi No Numa
description: The 3rd zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: World at War*, remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops*, and remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops III*. The map takes place at the Group 935/Division 9 Rising Sun Facility in a swamp somewhere in Japanese territory surrounded by dense jungle landscape.

name: Der Riese
description: The 4th zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: World at War* and remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops*. The map takes place at Group 935's main base of operations known as Waffenfabrik Der Riese near Breslau, Germany.

name: Kino der Toten
description: The 5th zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: Black Ops* and remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops III*. The map takes place at Group 935's Kino Facility, an abandoned theater in Germany.

name: "Five"
description: The 6th zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: Black Ops*. The map takes place inside the Pentagon US Military Defense building in Arlington, VA.

name: Dead Ops Arcade
description: The 7th zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: Black Ops*. The map is not a traditional zombies map, but rather a twin-stick top-down shooter arcade based version of the zombies game, starting on a beach.

name: Ascension
description: The 8th zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: Black Ops*, and remastered in *Call of Duty: Black Ops III*. The map takes place in an abandoned Soviet Cosmodrome in the Soviet Union belonging to the Ascension Group.

name: Shadows of Evil
description: The 18th zombies map, released in *Call of Duty: Black Ops III*. The map takes place in the 1940s fictional Morg City.
